about_the_game: Dive into a thrilling adventure as you descend through the dark levels of a mysterious bunker. Each level is connected by an elevator that takes you deeper, but it won't be easy. You'll have to solve challenging puzzles and face intriguing obstacles to move forward. Your decisions shape the storyline, adding layers of suspense and tension at every turn. Combining elements of adventure and escape rooms, Bunker Descent keeps you on the edge of your seat with unexpected twists and a few scares. Ready to take the plunge?
detailed_description: Dive into a thrilling adventure as you descend through the dark levels of a mysterious bunker. Each level is connected by an elevator that takes you deeper, but it won't be easy. You'll have to solve challenging puzzles and face intriguing obstacles to move forward. Your decisions shape the storyline, adding layers of suspense and tension at every turn. Combining elements of adventure and escape rooms, Bunker Descent keeps you on the edge of your seat with unexpected twists and a few scares. Ready to take the plunge?
name: Bunker Descent: Trapped Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel o AMD de 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 560 - GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 9 7950X - Core i9-12900K
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 6700 XT - GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

short_description: Work your way down through the bunker levels, solving puzzles and tackling challenges. Your choices drive the story’s twists and turns, shaping the intrigue and suspense along the way.
supported_languages:
Spanish - Spain*, English*
*languages with full audio support
